alert_icon.componentleveltooltip: Now is the time to dedicate to one of the Ruinous Powers... or refuse any master!

bar_mod.comment: Bar length is intentionally displayed inaccurately to emphasise bonuses!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(Value > ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercent + 0.1, 1), GetIfElse(Value < ValueBase, MinNumericValue(ValuePercentBase + 0.1, 1), ValuePercentBase))

localised_text.tooltip_text: Daemonic Glory||Unlock Daemonic Gifts and units by ascribing glory to the four Chaos Gods.
View Records||View a detailed history of this character's actions on the campaign map.
Replace Lord||You can replace this force's Lord with another, though it may take some time for the original Lord to become available again.
Undo assigned skill points||Any skill points that have been assigned but not yet confirmed will be undone.
View in Offices||Depending on this character's status, it may be possible assign them to an office, granting a number of effects.

character_context_parent.comment: This component gets passed a CcoCampaignCharacter from code

name_icon_parent.comment: uses ResizeChildrenToFit callback to shrink stat_name (& thus font size) as the mod_icon list grows

quests_subpanel.comment: chars have no more than 4 quests currently

localised_text.tooltip_text: Bretonnian Lords and Ladies honour the Lady through Vows and Troths. Pledge characters to complete noble actions to acquire each Vow or Troth and receive their particular benefits.
